post:
Scimitar.io

Based in the UK, Scimitar.io offer premium web hosting services for all possible requirements. We currently offer a free domain name to all new clients. All products are backed up by a 100% money back guarantee and 24/7/365 via phone, ticket, live chat, social media and email.

Get Unlimited SSD Disk Space for the lifetime of your service with Scimitar.io for a limited time only.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Why Choose us?


  • 24/7/365 Really means support at any time of day or night. We are based in the UK and offer 100% fully managed UK support

  • Extra resources including CPU and RAM gives your website greater reliability under high volumes of traffic

  • Premium hardware guarantees stability and reliability at all times for your website

  • Free daily offsite backups for all web hosting accounts fully automated and setup on your behalf

  • Upgraded Space to Unlimited from 20GB for a limited time only as a special forum offer

  • We don't overcrowd or oversell accounts on our servers, there will not be any performance drops of your website

  • 15 Day money back guarantee - We want you to be happy with our service, so we offer a full 15 day money back guarantee, if you are not happy simply contact us and we will refund you the same hour, no questions asked

  • Our team can help with a wide array of issues outside of our hosting services remit, such as website design issues and improvements, advice on running your website or community

  • Free website transfers from your old hosting provider at a time that best suits your needs
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PLANS & PRICING

Basic Hosting Plan - £2.99/Monthly

Ideal for small bloggers, small business owners or any small / moderate sized website. Currently offering a free upgrade to Unlimited SSD Disk Space. This is a limited time / space offering, once its full its invalid.


  • +25% RAM Per Account

  • +25% CPU Core Usage Per Account

  • 20GB (Forum Offer- Unlimited) SSD Disk Space

  • Unlimited Bandwidth

  • Free Daily Off-site Backups

  • cPanel Included

  • Nginx Available

  • Website Builder Included

  • Let's Encrypt SSL Included
<< Get Started >>

Premium Hosting Plan - £13.99

Ideal for moderately sized blogs, small community websites or a web portal / CMS based website.



  • +50% RAM Per Account

  • +75% CPU Core Usage Per Account

  • Unlimited SSD Disk Space

  • Unlimited Bandwidth

  • Free Daily Off-site Backups

  • cPanel Included

  • Nginx Available

  • Website Builder Included

  • Let's Encrypt SSL Included
<< Get Started >>


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you would like more information please visit Scimitar.io for more information.
